name: Number Wizard (magic school edition)
description:
The good old number wizard (expanded).

There are a few of these games floating around.

Learning Game Dev and taking a Unity coarse:

https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse/

I decided to challenge myself before I advance to the next stage by expanding on each game in the tutorial. This way I can learn more, faster ;)

I used graphics, music & sfx from OpenGameArt:

https://opengameart.org/

My version of Number Wizard prompted me to learn about animation, background music, transitions, particle effects, replacing and animating the mouse cursor. As well as randomly generated grumbling from the wizard :)

Included is a credits scene with direct links to all assets, authors and licences used. Oh yeah, had to learn about in game web links as well :) 

To be played full screen.
